thread.title: Ukrainian teen Pasha Bumchik jumps onto the roof of a moving TRAIN
thread.title_full: Ukrainian teen Pasha Bumchik jumps onto the roof of a moving TRAIN | Daily Mail Online

author: Jake Polden For Mailonline
title: Ukrainian teen Pasha Bumchik jumps onto the roof of a moving TRAIN
text:
387 shares 60
View
comments
This unbelievable footage captures the moment a teenager jumps onto the roof of a moving train - before running along the tops of the carriages.
Ukrainian vlogger Pasha Bumchik posted the POV footage of himself, which resembles something from a video game, to the internet.
Alongside the clip, which has been viewed nearly one million times, the 18-year-old Quote: : 'I love to ride on the roof of a subway car.'
Ukrainian vlogger Pasha Bumchik jumped down onto the roof of the train after evading a security guard
In the video, the teenager is filmed, via a camera mounted to his chest, scaling fences at the subway station and gaining access to the roof.
A security guard spots him lying flat and attempting to remain undetected before a train pulls into the station and he gets ready to jump.
RELATED ARTICLES Previous 1 Next 'Are we live? Oh brother!' Hilarious moment US weatherman... Tuneful pooch Hobbes watches himself singing along to the... From beaming with delight to frowning in horror! Children... 'The water aerobics guy thinks he's actually Beyoncé!' Watch... Share this article Share 387 shares Timing his leap to perfection, the teenager lands on top of the train just as it begins moving - commuters on the platform look up at the man in shock.
The train then starts to pick up speed and after briefly looking around to survey his surroundings, the vlogger runs along the top of it.
He shows no regard for his own personal safety and even jumps onto the roof of the carriage in front as a train going in the opposite direction passes.
The daredevil landed on the train just as it started to leave the station, much to the shock of commuters on the platform
The 18-year-old began running along the top of the moving train and jumping between the carriages
Turning the camera around to film himself, Pascha punches the sky in celebration and holds his hands out before starting to run again.
One slip at this point would almost definitely result in serious injury.
Reattaching the camera, the daredevil holds his hand out in front of him like Superman and continues to run towards the front of the train.
He later turns around and heads back to the divide between the two carriages and drops down onto the little step outside the emergency doors.
He showed no regard for his own personal safety and did not seem to be worried about falling from the train
Turning the camera around to film himself, Pascha punched the sky in celebration and held his hands out before starting to run again
In the extended version of the video , commuters riding in comfort and safety while inside the train can be seen looking up at the teenager in surprise.
Later the vlogger sticks his head out to check to see how far the train is from the station - he appears to come very close to colliding with a metal gate.
The clip concludes with the teenager jumping from the locomotive as it pulls into the station.
He then climbs over a fence and runs away before turning briefly to wave at the stunned commuters still on board the train.
The vlogger posted the clip, which has been viewed nearly one million times, to his YouTube channel
